body_html: @mrlzla The problem to me is that I am trying to link tensorflow library built in Release mode to my solution in Debug. When linking Release -> Release, everything works properly. Since I still do need Debug environment in our application, I will try to figure out if it's possible to get rid of this error message shown above.
